cesdspy.models¶

cesdspy.models.get(api_url, model_id)¶

Get model information.

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – A url to query
  • model_id (string) – A model ID
Returns:

The model information
Return type:

json

Example

import cesdspy
cesdspy.models.get('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091', 'RSF2v0')

# Returns:
# {
#   "record_id_var": "time",
#   "variables": [
#     {
#       "display": {
#         "shortlabel": "Time",
#         "label": "Time Stamp"
#       },
#       "domain": {
#         "set": {
#           "options": []
#         }
#       },
#       "is_input": false,
#       "var_id": "time"
#     },
#     {
#       "display": {
#         "shortlabel": "Seconds",
#         "label": "POSIX Seconds"
#       },
#       "domain": {
#         "interval": {
#           "bounds": [
#             315558000,
#             null
#           ]
#         }
#       },
#       "is_input": false,
#       "var_id": "epoch",
#       "units": {
#         "scale": 1,
#         "SI": [
#           0,
#           0,
#           1,
#           0,
#           0,
#           0,
#           0,
#           0
#         ]
#       }
#     },
#     ...
#   ],
#   "model_id": "RSF2v0",
#   "time_key": "epoch",
#   "model_uri": "http://www.nrel.gov/sustainable_nrel/rsf.html#RSF2v0",
#   "generation": 1472745315,
#   "description": "Selected power meters from the RSF 2",
#   "label": "RSF 2 Version 0",
#   "record_count": 189101,
#   "tags": {
#     "DC.source": "https://skyspark-ops.nrel.gov/proj/nrel",
#     "DC.description": "Selected power meters from the RSF 2",
#     "DC.creator": "Brian W Bush <brian.bush@nrel.gov>"
#   }
# }

API Info:

POST /models/{model_id}¶
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error message
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error message
cesdspy.models.issue_command(api_url, model_id, body={})¶

Issue a model command.

Parameters:
  • api_url (str) – A url to query
  • model_id (string) – A model ID
  • body (json) – A command to issue
Returns:

The result of the issued command
Return type:

json

Examples

import cesdspy
command = {
    "command": "get_model_strategy"
}
cesdspy.models.issue_command('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091/', 'RSF2v0', command)

# Returns:
# {
#     "result" : "default strategy"
# }

API Info:

POST /models/{model_id}/command¶
reqjson string command:
 one of {“restart”, “clear”, “set_model_strategy”, “get_model_strategy”}
reqjson array(any) param:
 command parameters
resjson string result:
 the result of the issued command
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error message
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error message
cesdspy.models.list(api_url)¶

Get a set model id.

Parameters:api_url (string) – A url to query
Returns:A set of model IDs
Return type:array

Examples

import cesdspy
cesdspy.models.list('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091/')

# Returns:
# [
#     "RSF2v0"
# ]

API Info:

POST /¶
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error message
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error message
